scenes.goal: Scout the slaver perimeter without raising alarm.

npcs.one_line: Coiled grace; eyes track every shadow.
Casual until footfalls change; then rigid.

places.one_line: Sputtering pitch torches every twenty paces.
Makeshift crow's nest over stacked crates.

factions.notes: Local order keepers with limited numbers
Operate from a hardened camp across the ravine

events.effect: guards rotate; stealth easier, persuasion harder
